channel.title: Apache Airflow on Documentation for Umuzi Tech Department

item.title: DAGs with Airflow
item.description: Create a dag that does the following: Grab all the open pull requests that exist on all the github repos you have access to and store them in a database. This should be a single task in your DAG For each pull request, get the timestamp of the latest review and store that in the database. This should be a single task in your DAG Send an email to yourself that shows the top 5 PRs that need attention in order of priority.
